author: Fareed Zakaria
title: The U.S. and China’s blame game isn’t saving any lives
description: The world’s two leading powers are trading insults and one-upping each other in a childish blame game.
content: What did the world including Trump know about the virus at that point? One day earlier, on Jan. 23, the WHO warned that all countries should be prepared for containment [of the virus], including active surveillance, early detection, isolation and case managem… [+4486 chars]
